languages.text: "Умереть за вас, Ваша Светлость". {n}Каждый член ополчения, от матерого блюстителя до щуплого писаря, поддерживает Высокого фактотума мрачным кивком.{/n} "Но, признаться, мы изрядно вымотались, пока пробивались сюда, и на роль штурмового отряда не годимся".

"Why, I intend to die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Every member of the militia, from burly enforcer to puny clerk, nods in sombre agreement with the High Factotum.{/n} "But I must admit, we are quite exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to being an assault squad."
languages.original_text: "Умереть за вас, Ваша Светлость". {n}Каждый член ополчения, от матерого блюстителя до щуплого писаря, поддерживает Высокого фактотума мрачным кивком.{/n} "Но, признаться, мы изрядно вымотались, пока пробивались сюда, и на роль штурмового отряда не годимся".

traits.locale_text: "Die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}". {n}Each member of the militia, from the burly enforcer to the puny clerk, supports the High Factotum with a grim nod.{/n} "But I must admit, we are pretty exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to be a assault squad."

"Die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}". {n}Each member of the militia, from the burly enforcer to the puny clerk, supports the High Factotum with a grim nod.{/n} "But I must admit, we are pretty exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to be a assault squad."

"Each of us would die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Every member of the militia, from burly enforcer to puny clerk, nods in sombre agreement with the High Factotum.{/n} "But I must admit, we are quite exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to being an assault squad."

"Each of us would die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Every member of the militia, from burly enforcer to puny clerk, nods in sombre agreement with the High Factotum.{/n} "But I must admit, we are quite exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to being an assault squad."

"Why, I intend to die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Every member of the militia, from burly enforcer to puny clerk, nods in sombre agreement with the High Factotum.{/n} "But I must admit, we are quite exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to being an assault squad."

"Why, I intend to die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Every member of the militia, from burly enforcer to puny clerk, nods in sombre agreement with the High Factotum.{/n} "But I must admit, we are quite exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to being an assault squad."

languages.text: «Mi intención es morir por usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Cada miembro de la milicia, desde los corpulentos guardias a los enclenques burócratas, asiente en sombrío acuerdo con el Sumo Factótum.{/n} «Pero debo admitir que estamos agotados tras la lucha para llegar hasta aquí, y no somos los más indicados para actuar como escuadrón de asalto».
languages.original_text: "Why, I intend to die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Every member of the militia, from burly enforcer to puny clerk, nods in sombre agreement with the High Factotum.{/n} "But I must admit, we are quite exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to being an assault squad."

traits.locale_text: «Mi intención es morir por usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Cada miembro de la milicia, desde los corpulentos guardias a los enclenques burócratas, asiente en sombrío acuerdo con el Sumo Factótum.{/n} «Pero debo admitir que estamos agotados tras la lucha para llegar hasta aquí, y no somos los más indicados para actuar como escuadrón de asalto».

languages.text: 「私は、あなたのために命を捧げます、陛下」{n}屈強なエンフォーサーから小柄な事務員まで、全ての民兵がハイ・ファクトタムに同意してうなずく。{/n}「しかし正直なところ、ここまでの戦いでかなり疲弊しています。それに、私たちはあまりアサルト・スカッドには向いていません」
languages.original_text: "Why, I intend to die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Every member of the militia, from burly enforcer to puny clerk, nods in sombre agreement with the High Factotum.{/n} "But I must admit, we are quite exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to being an assault squad."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、あなたのために命を捧げます、陛下」{n}屈強なエンフォーサーから小柄な事務員まで、全ての民兵がハイ・ファクトタムに同意してうなずく。{/n}「しかし正直なところ、ここまでの戦いでかなり疲弊しています。それに、私たちはあまりアサルト・スカッドには向いていません」

languages.text: “我愿意为您而死，大人。”{n}高阶顾问开了口。小队的所有成员，无论是魁梧的执法者还是瘦小的文员，都阴郁地点着头，赞同他的发言。{/n}“不过我必须承认，我们一路打到这里，真的已经累坏了。我们真的不太适合当突击队。”
languages.original_text: "Why, I intend to die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Every member of the militia, from burly enforcer to puny clerk, nods in sombre agreement with the High Factotum.{/n} "But I must admit, we are quite exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to being an assault squad."

traits.locale_text: “我愿意为您而死，大人。”{n}高阶顾问开了口。小队的所有成员，无论是魁梧的执法者还是瘦小的文员，都阴郁地点着头，赞同他的发言。{/n}“不过我必须承认，我们一路打到这里，真的已经累坏了。我们真的不太适合当突击队。”

languages.text: "Nun, ich habe vor, für Euch zu sterben, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Jedes Mitglied der Miliz, vom stämmigen Enforcer bis hin zum schmächtigen Schreiber, nickt düster, um die Worte des Hoch-Faktotums zu bestätigen.{/n} "Aber ich muss gestehen, wir sind recht erschöpft davon, uns hierher gekämpft zu haben, und wir taugen nicht unbedingt als Mitglieder eines Sturmtrupps."
languages.original_text: "Why, I intend to die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Every member of the militia, from burly enforcer to puny clerk, nods in sombre agreement with the High Factotum.{/n} "But I must admit, we are quite exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to being an assault squad."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, ich habe vor, für Euch zu sterben, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Jedes Mitglied der Miliz, vom stämmigen Enforcer bis hin zum schmächtigen Schreiber, nickt düster, um die Worte des Hoch-Faktotums zu bestätigen.{/n} "Aber ich muss gestehen, wir sind recht erschöpft davon, uns hierher gekämpft zu haben, und wir taugen nicht unbedingt als Mitglieder eines Sturmtrupps."

languages.text: « Eh bien, ma foi, j'ai l'intention de mourir pour vous, Votre Seigneurie. »{n}Chaque membre de la milice, du robuste prévôt au clerc chétif, soutient le haut factotum d'un sombre hochement de tête.{/n} « Je dois néanmoins admettre que les précédents combats nous ont exténués et que nous ferions une bien piètre escouade d'assaut. »
languages.original_text: "Why, I intend to die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Every member of the militia, from burly enforcer to puny clerk, nods in sombre agreement with the High Factotum.{/n} "But I must admit, we are quite exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to being an assault squad."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, ma foi, j'ai l'intention de mourir pour vous, Votre Seigneurie. »{n}Chaque membre de la milice, du robuste prévôt au clerc chétif, soutient le haut factotum d'un sombre hochement de tête.{/n} « Je dois néanmoins admettre que les précédents combats nous ont exténués et que nous ferions une bien piètre troupe d'assaut. »

languages.text: "Sizin için ölmeyi tabii {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}İri kıyım infazcıdan cılız kâtibe kadar tüm milisler, baş sallayarak Arşıkâhya'ya katılıyor.{/n} "Fakat kabul etmeliyim ki buraya gelene kadar çok savaştık, yorulduk. Taarruz mangası görevini üstlenmemiz pek uygun olmaz."
languages.original_text: "Why, I intend to die for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Every member of the militia, from burly enforcer to puny clerk, nods in sombre agreement with the High Factotum.{/n} "But I must admit, we are quite exhausted from fighting our way here, and we are not really suited to being an assault squad."
